com.henrikhedberg.ohap

Class OutgoingMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.henrikhedberg.ohap.OutgoingMessage

  • public class OutgoingMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds an outgoing OHAP message.

    Use integer8(int), integer16(int), integer32(long), decimal64(double), allBytes(byte[]), binary8(boolean), and text(String) sequentially to build a message. Then, call writeTo(OutputStream) to write it into an OutputStream, or asByteBuffer() to get it as a @{link ByteBuffer}.

    Version:
    1.1 (20160320)
    Author:
    Henrik Hedberg <henrik.hedberg@iki.fi>

      Appends boolean value as a byte into the message.
      OutgoingMessage decimal64(double value)
      Appends IEEE 754 floating-point double precision decimal number into the message.

      Appends unsigned 16-bit integer into the message.

      Appends unsigned 32-bit integer into the message.

      Appends text into the message.
